name: Could You Sit Still For Five Seconds?
name_original: Could You Sit Still For Five Seconds?
description:
***PRESS SPACE TO START***

SUBMISSION FOR LUDUM DARE 49: "UNSTABLE" (and my first GMS2 game ever!)

Click and drag puppies into position.

Use the treat and ball to placate angry puppies (click the button, then click the pup).

Use the bell if a puppy falls asleep.

When everyone's in position, click the camera button to take the photo!
